In other words, did we elect a terribly intelligent genius of manipulative powers, or did we elect an immature schoolboy?
That's a debate in itself: is Trump being super-clever & sly? Or is he truly so thin-skinned & narcissistic to insist on his own "facts"?
Some say that Trump is only being very clever with this Alternative Facts stuff. It's just a distraction from more serious decisions.
Perfectly understandable when folks of different religions debate nature of reality. But when a President insists on a fictional reality?
Usually when there's an argument over reality, it involves the intangible & unquantifiable. Such as God and the afterlife. Religion.
Spock & Kirk land on Earth, 2017. "Fascinating. Two sets of realities within one universe," observes Spock.
2/2 What is happening w White House & gagging of all their departments is just plain not right. Also shows lack of trust & paranoia.
